Dining
Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 2 restaurants and a coffee shop/cafÃ©. From your room, you can also access room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, limo/town car service, and express check-in. Planning an event in Framingham? This hotel has facilities measuring 10398 square feet (966 square meters), including a conference center. Free self parking is available onsite.
